title: Opens Wednesday
creator_credit: Barrie Nelson and Barrie Nelson Productions
brief_description: Opens Wednesday is a romp through a director’s rehearsal of a lively animated show. Nelson’s animated transformations are intimate and spectacular. Partial funding by the American Film Institute and National Endowment for the Arts.
